means: （尤指对着镜子）精心打扮( primp的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Too much time is spent in primping, too little at work.
sentence.Network_cn: 在打扮上用时太多, 在工作上用时太少.

sentence.Network_en: The primping alone took more than an hour.
sentence.Network_cn: 单是精心修饰就花了一个多小时.

sentence.Network_en: Primping today andand styling, for an interview I'm doing tomorrow in a Britney documentary! Fun!
sentence.Network_cn: 今天杀很大,美发, 美容,美甲,这都是为了明天布兰妮新纪录片的采访欧! 耶.

list.abs: ... We save you a piece of cake in the fridge. 我们给你留了块蛋糕在冰箱里。 Stop primping. 别磨蹭。 No manners. 没礼貌。.
